description: The young and handsome stepbrothers Klim Gromov and Jon Bae are hanging out in bed together, waiting for their strong and macho stepdad, Viktor Rom, to get home from work. Klim is the boy bottom of the threesome; his role is one of total submission in the relationship. Meanwhile, Jon is trained to take his stepdad’s dick deep and far up his ass, but Viktor has also been training Jon how to top for when he has a stepson of his own one day. In the meantime, he gets that practice out on Klim’s mouth and hole!
title: Viktor Rom Fucks His Boys, Klim Gromov And Jon Bae
